plot: A disgruntled teenager tries to get to the bottom of the use of a dangerous food additive, but finds himself being thrown out of major food restaurant after major food restaurant when looking for some answers.
title: MSG: The Unsuspected Killer
plot_es: A disgruntled teenager tries to get to the bottom of the use of a dangerous food additive, but finds himself being thrown out of major food restaurant after major food restaurant when looking for some answers.
plot_en: A disgruntled teenager tries to get to the bottom of the use of a dangerous food additive, but finds himself being thrown out of major food restaurant after major food restaurant when looking for some answers.
